skits.presenter: Anna needs help with fixing 🔧 her car. 🚗 Who does she need to call?
skits.responseCorrect: Exactly! Anna should call a mechanic 🧑‍🔧 to fix 🔧 her car. 🚗
skits.responseIncorrect: No, the doctor 👩‍⚕️ cannot help with car 🚗 repairs! 🔧 Call the right person.

skits.presenter: Who should you call when you need your hair styled? 💈
skits.responseCorrect: That's right! You need a hairdresser 💇‍♀️ to style 💈 your hair.
skits.responseIncorrect: Nope, a nurse 👩‍⚕️ can't style 💈 your hair!

skits.presenter: If you want to learn a new subject, who should you see? 📚
skits.responseCorrect: Correct! A teacher 👨‍🏫 can help you learn. 📚
skits.responseIncorrect: No, a doctor 👨‍⚕️ can't teach you a new subject. See a teacher 👨‍🏫 instead.

skits.presenter: Who should you call if you need a building constructed? 🏗️
skits.responseCorrect: That's right! A construction worker 👷🏽‍♂️ can build structures. 🏗️
skits.responseIncorrect: Not quite, a detective 🕵🏽 can't build buildings! Call a construction worker.

skits.presenter: Who would you call to help you with a legal issue? ⚖
skits.responseCorrect: Exactly! A lawyer 👩🏽‍💼 can help with legal issues. ⚖
skits.responseIncorrect: No, a pilot 👩🏽‍✈️ can't assist with legal matters. ⚖

skits.presenter: Who should you hire to keep your home 🏠 clean?
skits.responseCorrect: That's right! A cleaner 🧹 can keep your home 🏠 tidy.
skits.responseIncorrect: That's not it. An astronaut 🧑🏼‍🚀 can't clean your home! 🏠

skits.responseIncorrect: Nope, a judge 👨🏻‍⚖️ can't create a painting. 🖼 Try again.
